Class AddAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddAppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the logic to add appointments in the application.

    • OnActionCancelAppointment

      public void OnActionCancelAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Allows the user to cancel added appointment information and return to Home screen. The alert is called using a previously set lambda expression to reduce redundancy.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - button click
      Throws:
      IOException
